activities: The Company provides software and services for uniquely efficient data integration and transformative knowledge applications. Areas of expertise include the life sciences, biotechnology, pharmaceutical and medicine. IOI interacts with and develops contractual partnerships with clients in the EU/EEA and IOI may develops consulting relationships with individuals who reside in the EU/EAA.
personaldata: The IOI registration form requires users to provide contact information; IOI obtains contact information from clients, third-party vendors and other organizations.
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: To investigate unresolved complaints concerning compliance with the Safe Harbor Framework, IOI will utilize American Arbitration Association's (AAA) Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution
